products.title: Harrow Cream Roman Blind
products.metadescription:
This blind is so simple yet so chic, with a smooth surface and even smoother colour tone. This plain textured fabric is oozing with charm and resonates calm around a room.  
The beauty of plain and simple is that it holds endless possibilities for in which interiors it suits bes
